summary: Major reliability upgrade for the Haven AI Service ('Anti-Stop Policy') and a completely redesigned, empathetic onboarding experience.
changes: Implemented 'Anti-Stop' policy: AI service now degrades gracefully into Offline Mode instead of blocking user access.
Redesigned Onboarding Flow: Added dedicated Haven introduction screen with privacy-focused messaging.
Hardened System Prompts: Enforced strict therapeutic boundaries and removed data collection requests.
UI Polish: Flattened design aesthetics and updated icon assets for a cleaner look.
